title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout. Build 2002071610021.
OB: When pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, instead of remaining on the second row, the Launch item is moved to the first row.
EB: When deleting an item on the second row, the Launch item should stay on the second row without any changes to its position.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Run the attached test case.
2. Drag the Open Type cool item to the second row (last cool item).
3. Drag the Launch cool item (last cool item on the first row) to the second row, placing it after the Open Type item.
4. Drag the Search cool item to the second row, placing it after the Launch cool item.
5. Drag the Script cool item to the second row (last cool item on the first row), placing it after the Search cool item.
6. Press the Delete button.
   - This will delete the first item on the second row.
   - Notice that the second row is removed when the delete occurs.
   - The second row should remain.

Additional steps:
1. Run the attached test case.
2. Drag the Script cool item to the second row.
3. Drag the Launch cool item to the second row, placing it after the Script item.
4. Drag the Search cool item to the second row, placing it after the Launch cool item.
5. Drag the Open Type cool item to the second row, placing it after the Search cool item.
6. Press the Delete button.
